short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Choose a map, collect coins, and level up. New levels added every now and then. Have fun trying to beat the levels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The goal of this game is to collect all the coins in every level and try to level up as much as possible. I enjoy making levels and you can make levels too. Just go to discord and search for tnpg-extension click on the one that has the username Grantrocks and head over to the discussion. Instructions are located there. 

Some levels have secrets where you can walk through walls. Try to find them.


CONTROLS
Arrow keys to move around
R to restart if you get stuck
